suggest.sensio/framework-extra-bundle: If you want to use the builtin controller.
suggest.symfony/framework-bundle: If you want to use the bultin controller.
suggest.doctrine/doctrine-bundle: If you want to use the DoctrineRegistry.
suggest.snc/redis-bundle: If you want to use RedisRegistry.
suggest.predis/predis: If you want to use predis for RedisRegistry.
